services.title: Services
services.description: Your car deserves the utmost care from a workshop specialized in repairing and servicing cars of all kinds, where the experience extended over many years and the quality of work that cannot be competed through the most modern equipment in Jerusalem.

card1.title: Electrical repairs
card1.description: Provide your car with maintenance and repair services that include batteries, electrical systems, wiring, lighting, and electronic devices.

card2.title: Mechanical repairs
card2.description: We handle all types of problems using high-quality spare parts and the latest technology.

card3.title: Battery maintenance
card3.description: Our specialized technicians provide various services, including battery inspection and testing, as well as maintenance and replacement.

card4.title: Air conditioning
card4.description: We inspect critical components like the compressor, condenser, ventilation systems, and check/refill the refrigerant level.

card5.title: Accident Maintenance
card5.description: Your car is in safe hands with AHM. We specialize in car accident maintenance service.

ourWorks.title: Our Work
ourWorks.description: Welcome to the world of accuracy and quality! The management of AHM Car Maintenance Company looks forward to being the first company in the city of Jerusalem to enjoy distinguished services according to international standards and a reliable partner for all car owners. We promise you a unique experience and an exceptional journey when you visit us.

footer.description: What we assure you is that you can fully rely on our team for auto repair and maintenance services that are provided with high quality and at very reasonable prices for what you get, whether your car is new or old, whether you need scheduled maintenance or require extensive work, of course, we have more than decades. Our experience in retail makes it easy for us to handle all of our customers' vehicle situations.
